Token.Abstract: A class extension for UIImage that provides methods for resizing images.
Scales the receiver to the specified size.

Parameter.Name: newSize
Parameter.Abstract: The size of the UIImage to be returned. If this is the same size as the receiver, no scaling is performed and self is returned.

Parameter.Name: quality
Parameter.Abstract: The interpolation quality to use for scaling the image.

Token.Abstract: Scales the receiver to the specified size.

Parameter.Name: newSize
Parameter.Abstract: The size of the UIImage to be returned. If this is the same size as the receiver, no scaling is performed and self is returned.

Token.Abstract: Scales the receiver to a new size by applying the specified scale factor.

Parameter.Name: scale
Parameter.Abstract: The scale factor that determines the size of the returned image. Numbers less than 1.0 result in a smaller image; numbers greater than 1.0 result in a larger image. If this value is 1.0 exactly, no scaling is performed and self is returned.

Parameter.Name: quality
Parameter.Abstract: The interpolation quality to use for scaling the image.

Token.Abstract: Scales the receiver to a new size by applying the specified scale factor.

Parameter.Name: scale
Parameter.Abstract: The scale factor that determines the size of the returned image. Numbers less than 1.0 result in a smaller image; numbers greater than 1.0 result in a larger image. If this value is 1.0 exactly, no scaling is performed and self is returned.
